10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) turned to face us when he stood up to pray, before he said Takbir, and said: 'Make your rows straight and fill the gaps, for I can see you from behind my back

chapter.eng-name: Making up a missed prayer in congregation
